title: Vouchers & Reservations hub — clicking a list option in 'add new list' menu does nothing (regression)
root_cause: Unknown — after fe-bug-006 fix (async modal close), clicking a list option (e.g. Ontopo, BuyMe) in the 'add new list' menu now does nothing at all. Expected behavior: selecting an option should open the relevant add-voucher or add-reservation details modal. Was working correctly in MVP.
steps_to_reproduce: 2. Navigate to Vouchers hub (or Reservations hub)
3. Tap the add / create new list button
4. Menu appears with list template options (e.g. Ontopo, BuyMe, etc.)
6. Nothing happens — no modal opens, menu stays open or closes silently
